description: This file defines a React functional component 'CartSidebar' which provides a slide-in sidebar interface for viewing and managing items in the shopping cart. It utilizes React hooks and context to access cart state and actions, and renders cart items with options to modify quantities or remove items, as well as navigation links to cart and checkout pages.

methods.name: CartSidebar({ open, onClose })
methods.description: React functional component that renders a cart sidebar with item details, removal, quantity update, and navigation options.
